short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small extension for ecu edit forum to auto fill fields when uploading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension allowing for data to be saved and auto filled for file upload on ecu edit forums.

Just click the icon, input your desired fields and hit save.
To clear fields press the clear button, this also allows for upload with blank fields.

By default all fields are blank.
